alert.note: Alert for Iowa; Sauk (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 9:38PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Iowa, southwestern Dane and southwestern Sauk Counties through 1030 PM CDT... At 938 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Spring Green, or 11 miles north of Dodgeville, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Western Madison, Middleton, Mount Horeb, Dodgeville, Cross Plains, Mazomanie, Spring Green, Black Earth, Blanchardville, Barneveld, Blue Mounds, Highland, Arena, Plain, Ridgeway, Avoca, Orion, Clyde, Hollandale, and Blackhawk Lake Rec Area. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 18 between mile markers 49 and 74. U.S. Highway 12 between mile markers 251 and 255. U.S. Highway 151 between mile markers 44 and 47. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for south central Wisconsin.
